sect1.title: docbook-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;-dtd

sect2.title: Instalação de DocBook-3.1 SGML DTD
sect2.para: Install DocBook-3.1 SGML DTD by running the following commands:
Esse pacote não vem com uma suíte de teste.

screen.userinput:
install -v -d -m755 /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version; && chown -R root:root . && install -v docbook.cat /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;/catalog && cp -v -af *.dtd *.mod *.dcl /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version; &&
install-catalog --add /etc/sgml/sgml-docbook-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;.cat \ /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;/catalog &&
install-catalog --add /etc/sgml/sgml-docbook-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;.cat \ /etc/sgml/sgml-docbook.cat

sect2.title: Explicações do Comando
sect2.para: sed -i -e '/ISO 8879/d' docbook.cat: This command removes the ENT definitions from the catalog file.

sed -i -e 's|DTDDECL "-//OASIS//DTD Docbook V&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;//EN"|SGMLDECL|g' docbook.cat: This command replaces the DTDDECL catalog entry, which is not supported by Linux SGML tools, with the SGMLDECL catalog entry.

sect3.title: Informação de Configuração
sect3.para: The above installation script updates the catalog.
Using only the most current 3.x version of DocBook SGML DTD requires the following (perform as the root user):

screen.userinput:
cat >> /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&docbook-3.1-dtd-version;/catalog << "EOF" -- Begin Single Major Version catalog changes --
PUBLIC "-//Davenport//DTD DocBook V3.0//EN" "docbook.dtd"
-- End Single Major Version catalog changes -- EOF
